Drain being a DoT is irrelevant to this discussion, since we're talking about mana expenditure relative to damage output, not how much damage I can deal to a camp per cast. Additionally, you completely disregard the fact that Drain is *designed* to function in this kind of situation where he channels and takes hits while doing so. *That's why it heals him for a large percentage of the damage dealt.*

I pointed out the high damage of a fully channeled drain for the sake of reminding everyone that he is already a comparatively mana efficient jungler for the damage and sustain he has. This doesn't mean he isn't mana hungry at times (because he often is) It just means that he trades mana heavy clears for finishing them extremely healthy. The cooldown reset is already a large enough buff that giving it a mana refund would break his clear (unless it were very small refund, at which point I'd argue they should just reduce the mana cost outright).

Maybe it's your turn to quit being a Nub.

We're talking about clearing jungle, not team fighting/champion combat, so yes, I expect that you're fully channeling your drain on camps.

I'm not saying Fid is broken or OP, I'm saying letting him get a mana refund would be too strong of a buff, and wouldn't fix his larger problems (which I'm sure you understand better than I do). It would be much more appropriate to simply reduce the mana cost of drain (especially at later ranks) than offer any sort of refund. It's a cleaner fix that addresses his mana issues head on. 

Alternatively, like what some other people on this thread have suggested, Drain could just cost mana per second, e.g. 20 + (12/14/16/18/20 Mana per second), (still totalling to 80/90/100/110/120 mana for full channel). I think this would also be a fair buff, but it would mostly boost his mid and late game where he is no longer channeling full drains.

I'd appreciate if you stopped being so aggressive, I am trying to have a discussion and you're being combative simply on the grounds that you disagree with my logic.

It still effects clearing the jungle.  When fiddle is draining he can't auto attack or move to reduce damage taken.

Let me reiterate; Drain is not OP, giving it a mana refund on kill would be too strong (although not game-breakingly so).

I am not comparing him to the most notoriously over tuned and unfairly strong early game jungler out there, because frankly if he matched Lee for what he does he ***would*** be OP. Same goes for if you tried to compare him to Graves or any other over tuned FotY champ.

To quote myself:
> Giving him an ability that auto-retargets on killing a unit only makes sense until you realize a full channel drain can deal up to 900 (+ 225% AP)

I never said this was OP, I just said it doesn't make sense to give an ability that deals that much damage a mana refund on kill, since it is far too easy to end up never spending mana with that system in place. giving it a mana per second cost or buffing the max mana cost would both be fair options, but a refund would break how the spell works.
